website_summaries.verdict: Get your sledding on old-school style with this classic black heavy-duty inner tube.
pros: 32-inch size if you want something smaller
Low-profile valve stem won't hook clothing
cons: Some buyers say this tube arrives with defects or holes
May be a little too large for some to comfortably sit in

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these tubes as pool toys for the kids and to use in the pool during the winter to protect the pool from ice expansion. The tubes are made of extra-thick rubber and are extremely durable. The kids love them during the summer and they survived the long New England winter in the pool in freezing temperatures. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pepin

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for teenager size 5'4-5'9 110-130 lbs
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for teenager size 5'4-5'9 110-130 lbs...any bigger i'd go to larger size. When inflating make sure you have a tape measure so you can inflate to exactly 32 inches in diameter because it does not give PSI. You definitely want to inflate to the 32 inches in diameter to get best results on the snow slopes (that's what we use it for). Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: great idea. No problem and highly recommended tube for ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Colorado for the kids to ride in the river during vacation. The tube quality is tremendous. The kids (weight 150-270 lbs) were not gentle on this tube and it held up to the sharp rocks in the rapids and along the river edge. Not a problem at all. The valve stem is covered with a special cap to prevent it from hooking on your clothes...... great idea. No problem and highly recommended tube for kids to play.
customer_reviews.author: R Witt

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of what you buy from the warehouse at a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this as a warehouse damage box but it turns out it was a return from a customer. As I was filling it up I heard an air leak. It also had an arrow show where the hole was. I'm so glad that Amazon does a great job of inspecting the returns. So now I will look for a patch that will work with the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher m. Condon jr.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: As I was looking for tubes for my cooler, I kept coming across cooler tubes with mesh bottoms, but I was afraid of dumping the cooler into the river, while we were tubing. I bought this one so the cooler's center of gravity sits lower and even if it did tip the cooler wasn't going anywhere, without the tube. This tube is the perfect size to fit snugly around a 48 quart cooler and it holds up to the abuse of being stretched around the cooler. It does require either a bike tire pump (or similar) to inflate (and takes a while to deflate), but that's not a problem and the valve is well protected by a large cap.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Hultman, II

customer_reviews.title: A “Real tire inner-tube”. Gnarly, dude!
customer_reviews.text: This swim and snow tube is actually a real rubber inner-tube, it’s *NOT* a cheap single use plastic throwaway. It looks like it was manufactured just like a regular (though vintage) truck inner-tube. I love to float in the tube on the ocean and ride the waves at the beach. Seems that the motor boat and snowboard crowd is getting in on the fun.
customer_reviews.author: rose cunningham

customer_reviews.title: OK, but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4. One came with a hole in it (returned for a refund). Rubber has a very strong smell to it. The tube itself was smaller than I expect (not in diameter but in height). The stems have difficulty taking air from a standard air compressor attachment. The tubes will inflate but you lose a lot of air from the compressor doing so. The rubber does appear to be reasonably thick and has a nice rubberized stem cover which is nice e if you're using the tube to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F.

customer_reviews.title: Simple product and tough.
customer_reviews.text: Very tough built tube. Used it on river rafting (grade 2). There were some rocks and rough water and this held well. Haven't tried it on snow yet. Tips: use bicycle pump to inflate it. (5-8 mins) To deflate, you have to use pin or a pen to push the metal pin down to release air. (20 mins!) Make sure this stay under shade before deflate because it'll get hot!
customer_reviews.author: goomiu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I used it for some other purpose. I sliced it up and used it to tie up three newly planted trees to the tall stakes. Works like a champ. Good thick rubber doesn't harm the tender bark and allows the trees to move just enough to promote trunk growth.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen J.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for tubing and they were fantastic. Blowing them up was easy as well, each one only took about 4 min with the small compressor. They held up to being tossed all over the place too. They fit 2 200 lb men easily, one of whom carried a toddler on his. They are solid and well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to float down a local river/trout stream and they worked great. The stems have guards on them, unlike my tractor trailer tubes that stick out below the tube. Tube scrapped against rocks and gravel bottom and didnt pop. Only have used them twice this year, so not sure how long they last but they took the punishment very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Only used them in the pools so far but they're super durable feeling. Plan on using them to float the river here in texas and maybe snow tube in Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: MNP

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. No worries about tubing down a river in these. Thick, heavy material and seemingly built to last.
customer_reviews.author: smears

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I had in mind, and slightly better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone uses these in the pool. Seems like good quality rubber, and nice that the fill valves have a large rubber protective cap. I remember them from being a kid when they were everywhere you went to swim. These are large enough to be useful even for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: OK but very Lop-sided ....
customer_reviews.text: It's OK but very lop-sided. I purchased this China made 32" tube for my kids to use in the pool. I tried inflating it slowly, releasing the air and repeating, but no matter how I filled it, one side remained small and the other side got large. The overall size is good though. I also purchased another tube (6.00 x 16 made in Korea) at the same time for much less money . It had no reviews but was Prime and it worked much better. Size is about equal.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee Lang

customer_reviews.title: Maybe okay, just not for me
customer_reviews.text: Upon inspection, i didnt trust my behind on it. Better suited for the sub-200 pound set.
customer_reviews.author: Nonamemarine

customer_reviews.title: Great products floating down the Rapids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for floating down the river. It's extremely durable and I know it'll last forever. The only thing is it smells like rubber pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Niskanen

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it in the ocean yet... ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it in the ocean yet...have had it for 2 years. Looks well made, and hasn't deflated. Opening wide enough for my 250 lb son. Might give it a go this week @ Ala Moana Beach (the rocky part of the beach.)
customer_reviews.author: Kai808

customer_reviews.title: VERY pleased just like the type used by rafting/outdoor activity event ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to float in the river. VERY pleased just like the type used by rafting/outdoor activity event places. In all honesty I could have purchased the next size down but settled on this one because it has an optional cover available for purchase (which I will be purchasing because I was so pleased with the tube.) I hope to get an additional smaller tube for my child for this coming summer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for pool(large pool)recreation & I use it for a flotation device to support myself while cleaning the sides & bottom of the deep end of the pool! Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Baltimorejack

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great river tube, stayed firm even in very cold water with ~30 psi. The cap is nice filleted thick rubber that minimizes any discomfort of being poked.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great tube for the pool....it’s huge!
customer_reviews.text: Great tube for the pool. HUGE....fits 3-4 kids easily, and the valve stem is short with a special cap, so it doesn’t scratch and poke. The kids love
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for floating rivers and lakes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for floating rivers and lakes! Heavy duty, nice size for even a 240 lb man or a 130 lb woman. I like the valve stem being protected so it's impossible to get scratched from it. Very happy with these tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: i would like to return it and get the other inflatable tube ...
customer_reviews.text: i would like to return it and get the other inflatable tube i purchased. after blowing it up for the first turn it had a slow leak in it. how can i return it for the other one i purchased. Also i thought when i purchased both of them i was purchasing both tube in a box products
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach or pool
customer_reviews.text: This tube is very durable and great for the pool, river, or beach
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice tube
customer_reviews.text: This tube works great you can inflate it to a large size and it does not have any large bulges like a lot of them do.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM. brings back so many memories of being at the lake as a kid with tire inner tubes. a must have.
customer_reviews.author: jhj

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and durable would definitely recommend, a little smaller than I'd like, I think I'll get the bigger ones as well!! These things are a lot better than those snow tubes that don't last!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for sledding and we like it so much that we do not use the ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for sledding and we like it so much that we do not use the saucers any more. The cushion it provides saves your bones and back going over bumps and jumps. A bit pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable, but I was unable to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable, but I was unable to use it in the river due to the center hole being much larger than I though it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for closing a pool.
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as big as the picture makes it out to be. But I just needed it to close my pool. Plenty big for that. So good deal. Will see if it lasts thru the Chicago winter. I think it would be fine for anyone who needs it to sled down hill or float in pool.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD MCFARLANE

customer_reviews.title: BIG TUBE with very thick rubber.
customer_reviews.text: BIG TUBE with very thick rubber. Valve stem also as a rubber covering so no one gets stabbed by it. So far it's head of very well, and the shipping was fast. Would definitely by again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Floating the River
customer_reviews.text: These tubes are perfect for river floats and they last! I have bought three and they are all is great condition
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Day

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for river floats
customer_reviews.text: We use tubes for floating the Buffalo River. This is the perfect tube for the float. The valve stem does not poke you! All of our friends liked it and will be buying one as well. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: RazorbackFan

customer_reviews.title: recommend larger size offering
customer_reviews.text: as advertised...recommend larger size offering...like an actual tractor trailer inner liner size.
customer_reviews.author: FUKOweblamerHillaryandDems

customer_reviews.title: 8 and 10 love them! They are incredibly durable and get the ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these. Our girls, 8 and 10 love them! They are incredibly durable and get the job done. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: We got these for snow play. No problems at all. They worked perfectly. They seem pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Pool Tubes
customer_reviews.text: I used these in pool to support cover. Good quality. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Just like the good ol days
customer_reviews.text: Just like the good ol days!! They even smell like the ones we used as kids. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is that they are smaller than I had imagined. They would probably be a full 32" if fully inflated but there are cautions against over inflating. Bottom line - they work great, the grandkids LOVE them and they have easily survived hard play by lots of kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for skills training in youth football and it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using if for skills training in youth football and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: TheRAZ

customer_reviews.title: Crap.
customer_reviews.text: Stem broke completely off within 10 minutes of floating. Crap.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow-tubing!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters went snow- tubing the other day, and had a blast with these. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great price great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and quality of the tub. It is really heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome tubes for snow and water. only wish I would of gotten the smaller diameter
customer_reviews.author: chasse

customer_reviews.title: These are not good old fashion strong car tubes
customer_reviews.text: These are not good old fashion strong car tubes. We took them in the snow and two sprung leaks the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: River floats
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of these, used them 10+ on the water. they still work! if your more then 200lb your going to need 2.
customer_reviews.author: Drew B. Russell

customer_reviews.title: These tubes are NOT for kids according to the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Tubes were returned. When I received them it says NOT for kids, contrary to the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Dale from OKC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, even though I ordered the larger one ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, even though I ordered the larger one I guess I didn't realize how big 45" really is, I just don't inflate it all the way which is more comfortable any way.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they're exactly as advertised and great for floating on the river
customer_reviews.text: For the small amount we've used them so far, they're exactly as advertised and great for floating on the river. Tough, smelly inner tubes with a good cap to cover the poky stem.
customer_reviews.author: universalglove

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4. Two out the 4 already looked deflated the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to Abuse!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our inground pool. It is the only floatie left! We have a lot of middle and high school boys that swim. They bust all other float devices we have bought (a ton of them)! Use your imagination on what boys this age will do! This is the only one rugged enough to withstand their abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Voth

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a bulgarian training bag
customer_reviews.text: the 32 inch tube is perfect for a ~22kg / ~50lb bulgarian training bag if filled with sand
customer_reviews.author: nachomasterCR

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults or kids
customer_reviews.text: Half the price of fancy tubes and fits any size adult.
customer_reviews.author: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty tube
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy duty tube and a protective cap to cover the inflation stem. Held up my fat body all day!
customer_reviews.author: CALBEAR

customer_reviews.title: If next year is better, I'll post an update
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 5 stars for it's construction. As for durability, I live in Utah and this winter was the driest ever recorded so we didn't get a chance to try it out. If next year is better, I'll post an update.
customer_reviews.author: Ferol

customer_reviews.title: Definitely durable and fun to
customer_reviews.text: Very tough. Handles being towed behind truck in the snow at 25 mph! Definitely durable and fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Good tube but stinky
customer_reviews.text: The tube itself is fine but it has a very strong rubber stink to it. I've had it for 3 months and it's still there. I can smell all over my backyard which is huge.
customer_reviews.author: VicL

customer_reviews.title: Nice tube for floating water sports
customer_reviews.text: Nice tube,thick rubber, inflated it slowly and it held its shape without distorting. I bought it for lake and river use and it appears to be well suited for that type of use. Will see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley K. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: There was a Hugh bulge in top of it which ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a Hugh bulge in top of it which means weak spot in rubber and it would probably burst!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: The tube is very poor quality. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Now that poo/summer time is here, we went to blow up our tube, it had a whole in it!! The tube is very poor quality. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is very durable, i like where the stem does not stick out a poke yo while you are floating around.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL F.

customer_reviews.title: the material appeared sturdy though.
customer_reviews.text: I inflated it overnight and by morning it was flat. It did not hold the air and I did not over inflate it. the material appeared sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholaus Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Inflate well. Haven't used in snow yet due to mother nature melting the snow before my kids use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 tubes not even month old. sun eat's right through rubber
customer_reviews.author: Modern WoodShop

customer_reviews.title: The rubber valve stem cover is a nice bonus too
customer_reviews.text: Thick rubber construction, not vinyl. The rubber valve stem cover is a nice bonus too. Used it to comfortably float in a river all day, and I plan to use it for snow too.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality materials though
customer_reviews.text: The opening in this is bigger than expected. It's a little uncomfortable for tubing down a river. Great quality materials though.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Total rip off
customer_reviews.text: Used for swimming pool . Went flat within two weeks. Total waste of money. Don’t buy from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Doba

customer_reviews.title: Thick rubber
customer_reviews.text: Thick rubber. Blows up to 45 inches outside diameter. High grade rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I wish we'd bought these years ago. They held up great for river tubing and are wonderful for lounging in the pond.
customer_reviews.author: D. Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Best part is they don't blow out of pool in ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems extremely durable, have used as pool floats so far. Best part is they don't blow out of pool in storms unlike other floats.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Bought the 32" which is a good size for my 7 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 32" which is a good size for my 7 yr old. I was happily surprised to see an extra large valve stem cap to help protect the valve stem and my child.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: ... of weeks ago in the snow and it was great..
customer_reviews.text: We used this a couple of weeks ago in the snow and it was great...a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: morrisclan

customer_reviews.title: ... the old tubes for floating and tubing this is perfect and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for the old tubes for floating and tubing this is perfect and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great; good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for use in the ocean. Worked great; good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MABS

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Inflated very unevenly and blew up on the second sledding run. Would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Guajiro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun in the pond, fun sriding down snowy hills. Tond of affordable fun all year!!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it for raising a dock out of the water. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: This is one heavy duty tube!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the tube in a 44" snow tube made by a high quality manufacturer. This is much heavier than the original, weighing almost three pounds more. I also like the short valve stem with it's large rubber cap. This is a much better tube than what I expected to receive for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bulgarian Bags
customer_reviews.text: Are use this to make two Bulgarian bags. Quality rubber, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tubing down the river very durable my kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I also bought them last year and they didn't empty out. They were used to keep pool cover up.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Warning it gets very hot if left in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Warning! If left out in the sun it gets extremely hot and it will burn your skin. It also has a horrible petroleum smell that doesn't go away. I thoght it would work well as a pool pillow. While it stayed inflated, it started to crumble and the pieces stuck to the pool cover & chlorine floater. Doesn't seem like it will puncture easily. The best use may be as a snow tube. Defiantly not recommended for pool use.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco

customer_reviews.title: A well made Intertube for Floating your stress away
customer_reviews.text: Very well made; very heavy. These tough tubes are great for under the cover of my in ground pool .... however, I had to tie 3 of them together ... and put them in the middle ... let the tarp edges hang in the water cause the pool is very large 33feet x 15feet. You would definitely feel safe sitting in one of these in a pool, lake or river.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores B

customer_reviews.title: ... 'old school' tube for the lake and it was perfect!! Really strong
customer_reviews.text: I needed an 'old school' tube for the lake and it was perfect!! Really strong.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A Brady

customer_reviews.title: We love the one we kept but now have to wait ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 but unfortunately one of them had a tear near the valve. We love the one we kept but now have to wait for back order to get the torn one replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Van Iderstine

customer_reviews.title: Tough and ready
customer_reviews.text: Inflates beyond what you would think is the maximum allowable size. Holds air. Fits inside my 45" Spyder towable tube boat harness nice and tight. Valve stem is short and protects you by the conical shaped valve cap. Nice tube. P.S. I bought a warehouse restocked item and it came in it's original packaging with the addition of some wrapping tape otherwise as perfect as brand new!
customer_reviews.author: D. K.

customer_reviews.title: I was worried about an open hole but they worked just fine. These things are built solid
customer_reviews.text: Just took these sledding. I weight 185 and had no issues. I was worried about an open hole but they worked just fine. These things are built solid! Has a tire pump for the air. Husband and 2. Kids rode down no issues. So happy I bought these.they are for adults though because the hole is huge in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Torrie B.

customer_reviews.title: A great size for everyone who can use this item safely
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these for our lake. They perfectly fit a 6'3" 220lb adult and also a 5'6" 130 lb teen. A great size for everyone who can use this item safely. We haven't tried it in the snow, we look forward to it!
customer_reviews.author: Streby Family

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Small!  😩
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than expected. Pictures display adults using the tubes yet it fit my almost 3 year old. Very disappointed considering we bought them for our camping trip and were unable to use them as we had hoped, And to return them it would cost half of what I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: possible manufacturing problem
customer_reviews.text: The rubber of the product seems durable, but unfortunately the valve stem came out on the first day after inflation without ever using the product. I suspect that it was simply a manufacturing defect as otherwise the product seems fairly sound.
customer_reviews.author: Gregor

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SLEDDING FUN!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tubes for sledding and better for your money then going to a tire shop and trying to find a tube, because you wont find anything because everything is tubeless. They are well made and can take a lot of weight as long as you don't overinflate. So don't waste your time looking for any, my advice is buy these save yourself a headache.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Like, tubular...
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal, thick rubber like we had in the 70's, the only difference is these tubes won't stain your skin. The included valve stem cover is tapered so it doesn't scratch perfect for Winter ready to take them down a river in Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Engle

customer_reviews.title: Thick & durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great for winter sledding! Used this over the winter, 6yo, 8yo & myself all fit on it. Thick rubber, no worries about popping or puncturing. This summer it will be used in the water! Just check the weight limit, to be sure it is right for you. Only concerns: wish it were a little bigger, like I said at 6'2" and 200 lbs it was fine - even with all three of us on it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Griczin

customer_reviews.title: Easy fix, but should have shipped this way
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a valve stem tool to tighten the valve stems to prevent leaking. Easy fix, but should have shipped this way. I purchased 5 tubes in 2 sizes, 4 had loose valve stems. Other than that, they are great products. I use them instead of sleds for snow.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: thin and wide but an okay ride (that's what she said?)
customer_reviews.text: so it works okay but its very wide across and the sides are kinda thin it works well enough although i will be looking elsewhere in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Corwin Crombie

customer_reviews.title: Finally popped after two months of winter.
customer_reviews.text: Just noticed the 2nd tube I purchased two months has finally popped also. The entire side blew out. They served their purpose for only two months of winter. Disappointed these tubes didn't last longer. But they were somewhat durable. I have a couple of small children that were able to use these in our back yard. Better than vinyl tubes, but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband to take a child on his lap while tubing or on the lake. He is 6'3" and 215 pounds. While the tube says 45", it is very thin. The inside of the tube was way too big, even for my large husband. His bottom rubbed the ground, which made it unusable, I had to return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zion Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Love these tubes
customer_reviews.text: Love these tubes, ordered three. Although one of them broke the stem came off and deflected 5 mins into the river. I understand accidents happen so not letting that bring me down still have two perfect tubes
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love this tube
customer_reviews.text: Love this tube!! We have a new pool and my boys were going through a few floats a day. This one isn't very pretty, but it is holding up to my kids so i just love it!! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

product_meta.title: Tricam BT-45 Inflatable Swim and Snow Tube, 45-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Size:45-InchesThe Tricam BT-45 Inflatable Swim and Snow Tube is made for year-round fun from sledding in the winter to floating in a pool or lake in the summer. The tube is made of tear-resistant, durable rubber and measures 45 inches when properly inflated, making it comfortable whether you`re relaxing on the water or flying down a snow-covered hill. The rubber coated valve stem features a low profile design so it doesn`t interfere with using the tube. This model is designed for children and adults and should not be used as a life saving device. 250-pound maximum weight capacity. All you have to do is remove the tube from the box, inflate it with air and let the fun begin. The Tricam BT-45 Inflatable Swim and Snow Tube comes with a 1-year limited warranty that protects against any defects due to faulty material or workmanship. Tricam Industries has the reputation as being the leading consumer products company that specializes in the design, engineering, marketing and manufacturing of hardlines products. The company continues to build its reputation in the market by providing their customers with the most competitive programs in the industry focusing on quality, innovation and execution.
feature_bullets: Year-round fun from sledding in the winter to floating in a pool in the summer
Tear-resistant rubber and measures 45-inch when properly inflated
For children and adults with a 250-pound weight capacity
Rubber coated valve stem with a low profile design
